TEXT: The applicant is a NORP citizen , born in DATE and living in GPE , GPE . He is represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE ( GPE ) . The respondent Government are represented by their Agent , PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

The applicant served in ORG and in DATE retired from service . His military pension was assessed to PERCENT of his average wage , according to his rank and DATE of service and was paid from ORG . The payments terminated in DATE , following the dissolution of GPE .

However , on DATE , ORG , ORG , assessed the applicant ’s pension , as from DATE , to PERCENT of the amount he had received until DATE . The applicant appealed against that decision and after his appeal was dismissed , instituted administrative proceedings with ORG , which dismissed the applicant ’s claim on CARDINAL DATE .

According to the Government , in DATE the pensions of the former ORG officers have been increased by PERCENT , and ever since the real amount of those pensions has been PERCENT of what they amounted to in DATE . Furthermore , the Government claim that as from DATE the pensions in question had been adjusted in the same way as those of all other categories of pensioners , i.e. , to take into account an increase of salaries in GPE and as from DATE to take into account an increase in living expenses .

On DATE the applicant lodged a constitutional complaint claiming that the decisions of the administrative bodies and ORG violated his constitutional rights . On DATE the Constitutional Court informed the applicant that his constitutional complaint had been registered . On DATE and CARDINAL DATE the applicant requested that ORG proceed with his case . He received no reply .
On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant ’s complaint .
DATE LAW on ORG ( Ustavni zakon o PERSON ) provides as follows
“ Odlukom kojom se usvaja tužba ukida se osporeni akt kojim je povrijeđeno ustavno pravo i vraća nadležnom organu na ponovni postupak . ”
“ By the decision granting a claim , the impugned decision that violated a constitutional right is quashed and the case is remitted to the competent body for retrial . ”
